Package com.jcoinche.server

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<JCoincheProtocol.GameRequest>
          • com.jcoinche.server.GameManager

  • public final class GameManager
extends io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<JCoincheProtocol.GameRequest>
    This class should handle all the players connection from the server, by managing all the GameRoom entities Once connected to the Server, a player is guaranteed to enter a GameRoom (empty or not) If 4 players are connected simultaneously to a GameRoom, the game starts for the selected GameRoom
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    uberti_l
    See Also:
    ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter, Server
